Package persistance

Class DDBBAccess

java.lang.Object
persistance.DDBBAccess
public class DDBBAccess
extends java.lang.Object
Establishes a connection with the database specified in connect()

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    The protocol used to access the database
    private boolean[] using
    Array that idicates which connections are being used

  • Constructor Details

    • DDBBAccess

      public DDBBAccess​(DDBBInfo info, int maxConnections) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.sql.SQLInvalidAuthorizationSpecException, java.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException, java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException
      Connects to the database using the parameters
      Parameters:
      info - The information for the database connection
      maxConnections - Maximum number of simultaneous connections to the database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Error when connecting to the database
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - The driver is missing
      java.sql.SQLInvalidAuthorizationSpecException - Invalid credentials
      java.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException - The database IP address is invalid
      java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException - The database name is invalid

  • Method Details

    • loadDriver

      public static void loadDriver() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Charges the database driver If you don't have it you have to add the dependency. You can download it here https://mariadb.com/kb/en/about-mariadb-connector-j/
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - The driver is not installed

    • getConnection

      private int getConnection() throws OutOfConnectionsException
      Obtains the first available connection
      Returns:
      ID of the connection
      Throws:
      OutOfConnectionsException - There have been more connections requested than the maximum

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection​(int handler)
      Closes the connection for the specified handler
      Parameters:
      handler - Handler of the connection to close

    • getSentence

      public java.sql.ResultSet getSentence​(java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... params) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Executes an SQL query and returns the resulting objects
      Parameters:
      sql - Query to execute
      params - Query parameters
      Returns:
      ResultSet of the query
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - The query couldn't be executed

    • runSentence

      public int runSentence​(java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... params) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Executes an SQL query without return values
      Parameters:
      sql - SQL query
      params - Query parameters
      Returns:
      Nº of rows affected by the query
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - The query couldn't be executed
